item.description:
Learn all of Herb's tips to type people much more quickly using verbal and non verbal clues such as voice tone, voice speed, dress, personal story, words emphasized, etc.

 

Herb Pearce, M.Ed. in Counseling, has taught Enneagram workshops for over 21 years, uses it in his counseling practice with individuals, couples and families, and he is the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram and Herb's Tips for Living, both of which are available to purchase from Herb

7:30-9:30pm. Option to end between 9:30-10pm. Refreshments served.

Normal cost $40, sliding scale based on ability to pay to $20

www.herbpearce.com, 781 648 3737
item.how_to_find_us: Arlington Heights, Corner of Tanager St. and Wollaston Ave.
item.name: Tips on Typing People
